actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain small retailers who do not refine crude oil to use percentage depletion for a limited amount of their oil or natural gas production.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, owners of retail outlets who do not refine crude oil to use the percentage depletion method of deducting investment expenses for their oil or natural gas production.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain small retailers who do not refine crude oil to use percentage depletion for a limited amount of their oil or natural gas production.
